ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh yeah? Can you please clear up that leap of logic? Oh yes, please report me to a GM, you snitch, and see how they laugh at you after they check and see I
ygData.messageBody:
Neil Lambert wrote:
>
> From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>
> qenelin you're obviously a twinker now. sorry but it's damned clear

Oh yeah? Can you please clear up that leap of logic?

Oh yes, please report me to a GM, you snitch, and see how they laugh at
you after they check and see I only have one character.

The closest to twinking I ever came was giving a few plat to some of my
low level friends. Once.

But thanks for the clarification. In this day and age of personal
uncertainty and insecurity, it's good to know that I'm, obviously, a
twinker and nothing else.

--
Qenelin
